name: 卢克
introduction: Luke Rayn was born in Seoul, South Korea but raised in France.During his childhood he learned various martial arts, including VietVoDao and Taekwondo (he currently holds a Black Belt 1st Dan).He is a heavy practitionner of the acrobatic sport called "Tricking" and has notions of Parkour.He first started his career in Shanghai, China by acting in Commercials and small Video-clips.During his time in China, he developped his stunts and acting skills through various production including The Last Pizza (2019) and Stunt People (2021).He speaks fluently French, English, Spanish and has notions of Mandarin.
